Translations.Text: And all that was hidden in the peoplesâ€™ chests become personified and manifest
And that this is the Day their Creator reveals to them secrets He knows; which secrets they had long forgotten
The Big Event of the violent collision of all celestial bodies
How pounding is that collision
You just do not know what is like this violent collision
People will be like moths scattered about
And the mountains will be like flakes of wool carded out
Then he whose scales are tipped in favour of deeds of wisdom and piety
He will live a life of bliss in the exalted and blissful society
But he whose good works are light in weight and below par
Will be fostered by the deep bottomless abyss
And you just do not know what it is like in the abyss
It is the blazing infernal pit expressing fury with a crackle and a hiss
Multiplicity of the good things in life between wealth, conveniences and progeny divert your attention
Until the graves become your house of detention
There and then will you come to know all that is in conformity with truth and verity
But indeed you will come to know what is in accordance with fact and reality
No, but if only you knew the reality of what awaits those whose actions and dispositions do not accord with the divine standard, you would not succumb to illusions
For you will see the Hell fire awaiting the unjust who failed to reason their own conclusions
And you will see it with the eye of certainty

There and then shall you be asked of how you used the fruits of the years you received to your comfort and to your enjoyment and content, and how you exercised your faculties divine with which Allah had endowed you and to what extent
